insurances.name: Auto Insurance
insurances.description: Coverage for damage to your vehicle and liability for bodily injury and property damage to others.
insurances.requirements: Valid driver's license, vehicle registration, and vehicle information.

insurances.name: Home Insurance
insurances.description: Protection for your home and belongings against damage or theft.
insurances.requirements: Property ownership or rental agreement, inventory of belongings.

insurances.name: Life Insurance
insurances.description: Financial protection for your loved ones in case of your death.
insurances.requirements: Health questionnaire, medical examination (for certain policies).

insurances.name: Health Insurance
insurances.description: Coverage for medical expenses, including hospital stays, surgeries, and prescriptions.

insurances.name: Travel Insurance
insurances.description: Protection for unexpected events during travel, such as trip cancellation, medical emergencies, and lost luggage.
insurances.requirements: Travel itinerary, medical history (for certain policies).
